titles.title: Expedited Consideration of Terminations, Reductions, and Savings Act of 2011

To establish procedures for the expedited consideration by Congress of the recommendations set forth in the Terminations, Reductions, and Savings report prepared by the Office of Management and Budget.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
